strings.evolution:
Ah, the winds of change!
Check out what I can do now!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect your world, and your crystals!
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. Following in the footsteps of his father Dorgann and Galuf, Bartz set off on a journey to rid the world of the ancient warlock Exdeath, who seeks to rule the world with the power of the Void. He had always been a positive influence in the party, always adamant in his quest to save the world. However, he lost all composure when his hometown of Lix was swallowed by the Void at the hands of Exdeath. His rage ended up destroying the airship he and his companions had boarded.
strings.fusion:
I'll grow even stronger using the
techniques I learned from my father!
strings.summon:
Never lose your sense of adventure.
Look forward to workin' with ya!

strings.evolution:
Now I know how Dad must have felt.
Dorgann the Dawn Warrior's legacy continues with me!
strings.affinity:
Let's go. We'll keep everyone safe.
We'll protect our world, and our crystals!
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he was involved in the war of the Crystals. During his journeys to protect the Crystals, he learns of the existence of Exdeath, an ancient warlock seeking to lead the world to destruction. More astoundingly, he learns that his late father was one of the four Warriors of Dawn who had previously sealed away Exdeath and saved the world. Following in his father's footsteps, he sets out to unseal the Legendary Weapons and defeat Exdeath within the Interdimensional Rift.
strings.fusion:
I've got to become stronger!
I owe it to those I've lost!
strings.summon:
You're you, and that's all that matters to me!
I'll lend you my strength!

strings.evolution:
I can feel the strength...and the spirit of the Crystal...
Such incredible power!
strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. He is passionate, and a powerful ally who does not hesitate to help his comrades. He travels with his friends to protect the Crystals of wind, water, fire, and earth. Yet the Crystals are destroyed, one by one, by outside forces. Still, as each Crystal shatters, Bartz and his allies gain new skills to help them in their noble cause.
strings.fusion:
The world is so vast...
I've got to be stronger if
I'm going to see it all.
Will you lend me your strength?
strings.summon:
I feel the power of the Crystals here, too.
Please, let me fight with you!

strings.description: A young man who appears in tales from another world, where he hailed from the village of Lix and was involved in the war of the Crystals. His father's last wish was for Bartz to travel the world, and thus he roams, from one land to the next with his chocobo, Boko. In the course of this wandering, he sees a meteorite fall from the sky and strike Tycoon. Following its path, he meets the princess Lenna, and Galuf, an old man who has lost his memories. This is how his true adventure begins. Using the skills that his father, Dorgann, passed on to him, he defeats many strong foes...though he cannot defeat his childhood fear of heights so easily.
strings.fusion:
Thanks!
With this kind of power,
I'll be able to fight on.
strings.summon:
The wind is calling me...
Let's go see this wide world together!
